name: Farm Hunt
description:
This game is an entry for the first edition of "Curious Game Jam"!

The theme was "Recreate 70-90's Arcade Games". This game based on the classic arcade game "Duck Hunt".  

In this game, our city is under attack by animals! 
Each wave of animals will contain a new type of animal. But fear not, you will also obtain a new  projectile to launch! Between waves, the city is restored to its former glory. Can you protect the city from total destruction until the very last wave?

Extra challenge for the hard-core gamers <:-) 
Can you finish all the waves using only your "Q" (or "A")??
